quoteLast: ,’ growled Newman; ‘it can’t want more by this time; and I had my breakfast at eight o’clock, and SUCH a breakfast! and my right dinner-time two! And I might have a nice little bit of hot roast meat spoiling at home all this time--how does HE know I haven’t? “Don’t go till I come back,” “Don’t go till I come back,” day after day.
title: Nicholas Nickleby
author: Dickens, Charles, 1812-1870
